about_the_game:
Quiztopia : The Ultimate Trivia (Demo) is Quiz Game for kids for age 5 and above. This game helps everyone to increase their knowledge by completing various different trivia challenges.

Features
-Suitable for age 5 and above.
-Various different Trivia categories such as Maths, Science, Geography, GK, English and Picture.
-Difficulty level increases after completion of each level.
-There are 10 questions in each level and each trivia category has 10 levels. (Demo version give access to 1 level in each trivia category)
-Many More.

Get Ready for Ultimate Trivia Adventure ahead.....
